title: Interpretation of a dream about cake, seeing cake in a dream, eating cake

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cake for a single, married, and pregnant woman for a divorced woman if she made a white cake with chocolate and strawberries with cream by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a dream about cake Cake in a dream indicates kindness, surprises, sustenance, and a good reputation, and a dream about a white cake indicates kindness, comfort, comfort, good skin, and relief from worries. From worries, a dream about a pink cake indicates a change in circumstances, pleasure, surprises, and relief from something. A dream about a black cake means relief after fatigue, a change in circumstances, and relief for those in distress. A dream about a yellow cake indicates fatigue and gossip. A dream about a spoiled cake indicates loss, fatigue, and differences. Seeing eating cake indicates goodness, changing circumstances, nutrition, good skin, and relief from worries. Seeing buying cake indicates the goodness of things, resolving disputes, surprises, and relief for those in distress. A dream about giving a cake or donating a cake indicates good things, making things easier, and good skin. Dreaming about cake indicates kindness for a pregnant woman, improving matters, nutrition, and relief from fatigue. Dreaming of cake indicates a lot of kindness. Joy, nourishment, good skin, relief from worries and dreaming of a big cake indicates surprises, changing circumstances and good reputation, dreaming of a generous cake indicates kindness, kind words and facilitation. Things and comfort are worries, dreaming of cake dough or kneading cake indicates kindness, new work, pleasure, surprises and changing circumstances. Fruit means change in circumstances, kindness, improving health and resolving conflicts. Cake for a married woman, or a cake for married people, indicates goodness, justice, good skin, good reputation, and relief from worries. Cake is one of the best types of sweets for many, and its interpretation varies according to the type and the way it appears in a dream. A woman gets the correct interpretation without any modification, and we must know that seeing cake in a dream in general is a great indication of the scope of nutrition and goodness. Interpretation of a cake in a dream by Al-Osaimi Sheikh Al-Osaimi interpreted the vision of a cake in dreams with several praiseworthy interpretations and meanings, symbolizing goodness, happiness, and success for those who see it. The meanings of buying a cake in a dream for everyone indicate the satisfaction of desires, success in work or study, increased income and money, and good news of marriage for a young man and a girl, and God knows best. The meanings of cake in a dream indicate good relationships with people, good work, good morals, and the emergence of happy occasions for those who see it, whether male or female. Interpretation of a cake in a single dream The interpretation of a dream about a cake has many elements in a single woman's dream. If the cake she saw in the dream was covered with cream, this will be evidence of her upcoming wedding date, as it is evidence of good news, livelihood and emotional news. When an unmarried girl sees a cake in a dream, this symbolizes the arrival of happy news, the collapse of fears and getting rid of problems for the one who sees it. Also, seeing a cake in a girl’s dream is evidence of success

title: Seeing a belt in a dream, wearing a belt in a dream, and interpretation of a dream about wearing a golden belt by Ibn Sirin.

preview.html: Seeing a belt in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A belt in a dream is one of the visions that have multiple interpretations. Whoever sees a belt tied tightly around his waist in a dream, this indicates that he is facing seriousness and stability in the various matters of his life, and he cuts the belt. In a dream, it indicates the breaking of kinship ties, and there are various other interpretations that we will explain in the essence of the article. Seeing a belt in a dream A belt in a dream means tightness, because it is a constant of tightness. Seeing a loose belt indicates some problems that the founder faces. Whoever sees in his dream that he is tying the belt around his waist And he tightens it, as this indicates his stability in his dealings. The belt that falls in the dream indicates what will happen to the pioneer, and God knows best. A loose belt in a dream indicates good behavior on the part of the visionary. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the belt untied or tied in a dream means negligence and negligence on the part of the visionary. The dreamer’s side regarding the most important matters of his life. Cutting the belt in the vision does not portend good. Whoever sees in a dream that he is buying a belt, his vision shows good behavior in the problems he is going through in his life. Seeing a lost belt studded with gold or diamonds means losing insight into something important or not The ability to act well in various different matters in his life. Ibn Shaheen said about losing a belt in a dream: It is a vision in which there is no good. Interpretation of the golden belt by Ibn Sirin Usually you see that the golden belt is stolen by someone indicates a warning to be fully alert For anything bad around you that may happen or to be completely careful of your failure in something. If one sees a golden belt in a dream and tightens it around his stomach, this indicates that he is protected from any harm that may befall him. Ibn Sirin also said that the golden belt in a dream is a sign of strength. And endurance. Losing or losing the golden belt in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer a great loss or a major loss of an important opportunity. The theft of the golden belt in the vision indicates a failure in a specific matter of the vision, or perhaps a warning of failure if the dreamer does not pay attention to what is happening around him. If in your dream you see an attempt to steal a gold belt and sell it, it means that you are thinking about something wrong and you need to undo it so that the consequences are not so tragic for you in the end. Buying a gold belt in a dream means that you will soon buy something valuable that you have been hoping to buy for a long time. A belt in a dream for a single woman. It has been said that seeing a belt in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of that girl’s imminent marriage. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is buying a belt, this is a sign of great joy and happiness that she will soon have. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that Someone gives her a beautiful belt as a gift, this indicates the imminent marriage or engagement of that girl. Ibn Shaheen and some commentators said that seeing a black belt in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence that the girl will satisfy many of her life’s desires or fulfill an important desire she had. Interpretation of a dream about a leather belt for one girl can indicate a lot of happiness and joy. Hitting a girl with a belt in the

title: Interpretation of shaking hands with the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreams are the language that the subconscious speaks to the subconscious, which always translates happiness, sadness or fear around us in the form of these dreams, which make us many things that can be very strange to reality, which sometimes make you search for the interpretation of shaking hands with a dead person in a dream or even strange things, so in this article the Encyclopedia website provides you with an explanation of this vision that can be a source of panic for many. Interpretation of shaking hands with a dead person in a dream If you dream that you are walking in the street and then meet one of the people we have lost in this world. Then you talked to him and shook hands with him and there was a small meeting between you, this is evidence that you will soon meet one of your old friends. That both of you are connected to the dead and this vision may be a sign. However, you will be very happy to see this person and you will be very excited and perhaps your relationship will return to what it was before. This dream can be a sign of a strong relationship between you for the elderly, but it ended later. The connection between you was lost, this person is trying to reconnect you again because he misses you very much. This time, he may want to communicate with you in any way and will try to make you more comfortable. Perhaps this will work with both of you, so if this man returns to you , so do not lose him again. Interpretation of shaking hands with the dead in a dream and the husband or fiancé is with you, or if the fortune teller is a man and the woman is with him. And they all shook hands with one of the dead and you were with them, this is evidence that someone is trying to spoil your emotional life. This person may be a former friend or girlfriend who is trying to contact your new partner to end your relationship. And she is planning a plan, so you have to pay attention to her and protect your new partner from the harm of people who do not like your relationship. As for the interpretation of shaking hands with a dead man in a dream, and you were very afraid of him and he deliberately scares you. This is a sign of a lot of bad news and may be due to a situation or problem. What you did in the past, but it will come back to haunt you and steal your peace. Which you have now, and this vision may also indicate the imminent death of a member of your family. Therefore, this vision in general does not bode well, but rather it is one of the hated visions that should be forgotten and not told to others. On the other hand, if you shake hands with a dead person and miss him very much, and embrace him, this is a sign that there is a great livelihood that can be earned soon. Perhaps this dream is also a reminder So the person to return to pray for him again. Shaking hands and kissing the dead in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees that her deceased father or mother came in a dream and kissed her while she was in a state of sadness. After that, the interpretation of shaking hands with a dead person in a dream means that they are in dire need of prayer for them. It is a vision that reminds the girl of her parents and urges her to pray for them more than before. The prayer of a righteous son for his dead father or mother is always one of the things that continues to increase the balance of their good deeds in the afterlife. Regarding shaking hands and kissing the dead in a dream for a single woman, this person was not known to the girl in reality, but she learned about him during the dream. This

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing killing mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing killing mice in a dream, seeing killing a small mouse in a dream, interpretation of a dream about killing mice for a girl, seeing a mouse is a dream that causes fear and horror for many people, so hurry. A clear and detailed explanation of this vision, because seeing killing mice in a dream has many interpretations and symbols that differ from one person to another. Another, so we will deal with the interpretation of the dream of killing mice in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of killing mice by Ibn Sirin: Seeing mice in general in a dream is an indication of enemies in the dreamer’s life. Seeing mice in a dream symbolizes a loss of money for me. Interpretation of seeing mice killed in a dream It indicates defeating enemies and getting rid of them. As for whoever sees that he hit a mouse with an arrow or a stone, this indicates the absence of an evil woman. Seeing a mouse in a dream is evidence of cheating and deceiving a woman or having sex with her. The interpretation of a mouse coming out of the nose is evidence that his son will get sick. Seeing a mouse in a dream symbolizes a thief. Seeing a killed rat in a dream is evidence of causing harm and theft to the dreamer. Interpretation of catching a mouse in a dream is evidence of the presence of a deceitful woman. Interpretation of killing rat poison in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s attempt to defeat his enemies. Killing a mouse by trap shows A lot of deception and cunning. Killing a mouse by hand in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is trying to overcome all the difficulties in his life. Seeing killing a mouse in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will have a high status in society. Interpretation of a dream about killing mice for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing killing Mice in a girl’s dream are evidence of a deceitful and traitorous person in her life, and you must be careful and wary of him. Killing mice in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will get married soon. The interpretation of seeing a mouse inside a girl’s clothes in a dream is evidence of her being exposed to it. Individuals seeing a group of mice indicates something they are afraid of. And worry about it. As for seeing a mouse eating the food of unmarried people, this is a sign of rising prices and the high cost of living. Interpretation of a dream about killing a small mouse: The interpretation of seeing killing small mice in a dream is evidence that the pioneer discovers his real enemies. The dream of killing a small mouse in the house is evidence of invalidity. The plans of one of the pioneer’s relatives. The interpretation of seeing a rat in a dream indicates the occurrence of misfortunes and problems that happen to the dreamer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hypocrisy in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see hypocrisy in a dream, symbol of hypocrisy in a dream for single and married women and men, signs of hypocrisy and lying, meaning of hypocrisy and hypocrisy, seeing hypocrisy and crying, hypocrisy is a characteristic of those who have sick hearts and God protects us in His Noble Book as the Messenger of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, forbade us, meaning that We show a person the opposite of what he feels and he cannot determine his place in something, and when we see hypocrisy in our dreams we feel very confused and do not find an appropriate explanation, and therefore we will discover today through the interpretation of seeing hypocrisy in a dream in detail in this article.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of hypocrisyInterpretation of a dream about hypocrisy In a dream, as the distinguished researcher Ibn Sirin explained, it indicates a large number of wonderful enemies who envy him and wish him harm. Seeing hypocrisy in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a mentally unbalanced person who behaves incorrectly in many aspects of his life. Whoever dreams that he is a hypocrite in a dream appears He is unable to bear his responsibilities and face the crises and difficulties he is going through. Seeing hypocrisy and laughter in a dream indicates lies and hatred, and that the careful narrator of those around him is the opposite of what he feels. Dreaming of seeing hypocrisy exposed in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a person close to God who is distinguished With wisdom, logic and insight. Dreaming of hypocrisy and lying in a dream is an unpleasant vision that indicates failure in professional and personal life. Interpretation of a dream of hypocrisy for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing hypocrisy and crying in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will suffer from a big problem and a disaster that could cause the smell of her enemies. Seeing a fraudster in a woman’s dream is evidence that she has a close friend, but he hates her, is jealous of her, and really hates her. The dream of hypocrisy in general in a free woman’s dream is evidence that she is unable to make crucial decisions in her life and feels hopeless and frustrated. Seeing a single girl as hypocritical and trustworthy For everyone in a dream, it is evidence of her intelligence in relationships with others and her ability to control them. Seeing a person’s expression of hypocrisy in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will enter into an emotional relationship with a person who does not suit her and may end in failure. Interpretation of hypocrisy for a married womanInterpretation of a married woman’s dream of hypocrisy Evidence that she has many evil people who envy and hate her in her life. A dream about a husband’s hypocrisy in a married woman’s dream indicates that he is a weak person and cannot bear his responsibilities towards his family and children. The fact that a married woman sees her compatibility with her husband is evidence of the many differences between her family members. And the husband, and she may end up in divorce. The dream of seeing a hypocrite in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has a strong personality to control things and control family members. Seeing family hypocrisy in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the presence of many problems with family and friends in reality, and they may conflict. Interpretation of a dream about hypocrisy for a man: The interpretation of seeing hypocrisy and betrayal in a man’s dream indicates the presence of many fears, sorrows, and betrayal from the person in charge.

title: Interpretation of seeing the police in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the police in a dream by Ibn Sirin. See the point: The police in the dream. The dreamer will feel safe and enjoy calm nerves and emotional stability. This vision also shows that the dreamer has the ability to achieve his goals in life easily and without problems or transgressions. If one sees in a dream that policemen are entering his house, then this A sign of many blessings that he will receive. Elements of happiness are present in his home. This vision is also considered a sign of deliverance from some of the problems and crises that surround the visions. If anyone sees this, the policemen call him by name, because this is an indication of the imminent fulfillment of some cherished desires that the dreamer is looking forward to To achieve it in the near future. Seeing a policeman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a policeman in a dream means that the dreamer is an organized person in his entire life, whether social, professional, or in his relationships with others. Seeing a police officer also indicates a feeling of security. And that the dreamer is a person who follows the law and does not He departs from it for any reason. This vision also shows that the dreamer has the ability to confront crises and difficulties and solve them. And that he always tries to achieve his goal in life without getting tired or desperate. And if a person sees in a dream that he is eating with a policeman, this is an indication of some family disputes in his family area. And he works hard to solve it and get rid of it. This vision symbolizes that the dreamer is a successful person at all levels, whether in his professional life or in his marital and social life. Interpretation of a dream about the police for a single woman: If a free girl sees a policewoman in her dream, this is a sign of her imminent marriage to a man in an important position. And she will live a calm and stable life with him. Seeing the police in a single woman’s dream indicates that she feels anxious and panicked when she sees the police in reality. The symbol of the police inside an individual family in hard life, hard work, and fear of the unknown. If a girl feels safe when she sees the police in reality, then seeing the police In the dream, her sense of security appears and her psychological state improves a lot. Another interpretation says that seeing the police in a dream is for one person. It shows that he has fallen into a big problem from which he will not be able to escape except with the help of others. This vision also shows that this girl is going through a difficult psychological battle between two things. One of them is right and the other is wrong and she must make a decision from them. It also indicates that there are those who impose decisions on them by force and this is what constantly creates problems and quarrels between them and these people. Interpretation of a dream about arresting someone I know. If one sees in a dream that the police are arresting someone he knows, this is a sign that this person will escape. The person who is part of the conspiracy that has been set up against him. What if a married woman sees the police arresting her husband in a dream, this is a sign that he loves her with excessive love. title: Interpretation of a dream about white pigeons in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white dove in a dream. Such a vision is generally classified as one of the dreams that portends goodness, happiness, and livelihood for the pioneer. It differs from one person to another, depending on the social status of the fortuneteller, and the many details that appear in the dream, and in light of this, we will explain to you in the following lines the interpretation of a dream of a white dove in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a white dove in a dream, since seeing these birds in white is classified as one of Desired visions, which are often promising, include many interpretations and meanings, which usually vary depending on the social status of the viewer and what he sees. In a dream, details, and here we present to you the interpretation of a dream of a white dove in a dream, which is: If a person sees a white dove in his dream. It is evidence of security and trust, especially in his money. In addition, this vision is evidence of good news on the path of insight. In the event that a girl sees An unmarried woman sees a white dove in her dream. This dream, as many jurists interpreted it, is evidence that she will get married soon. Likewise, if a person sees a white dove in his dream, he slaughters it. It is evidence of many problems and obstacles, and God Almighty is over everything. Also, if a person sees in a dream The nest in which pigeons live. This dream is evidence that his life will be calm and successful. The near future. Here we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream, which is: If someone sees a black dove in a dream. This vision is evidence that the person with vision is exposed to many difficulties, problems, and heartaches. But if a person sees in a dream that a black dove enters the house. This is The vision is evidence of the arrival of sad and bad news to the pioneer. If one sees in his dream that he is catching colored pigeons. It is evidence of the fulfillment of many desires, goals and ambitions that he wishes to achieve. If the sound of pigeons crying is seen, then this vision is a sign of the death of someone close to him and dear to him. But if he sees that he is eating pigeon eggs. This vision is evidence of the dreamer’s success in big business, as he will earn a lot of money through it. title: Interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream. Interpretation of dreams is an ancient science in which many Arab translators excelled, including the translator Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Such as seeing areas that have been visited before, such as airports and archaeological sites. The meanings of these dreams vary depending on the condition of the viewer, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a dream for a single woman at the airport means that she wants to make changes. Positive in her life. This vision may indicate that Almighty God will grant the dreamer a happy life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is going to the airport to pick up a passenger, her dream indicates that there is a desire waiting to be fulfilled and if that person returns on schedule, it means that her desire It will come true soon. If she is late, this is an indication of the delay of her desire. The dream of a single woman packing her bags to go to the airport indicates that she refuses to tell anyone her secrets and privacy. One of the most promising dreams for an unmarried woman is her dream of going to the airport to travel and the young man preventing her from doing so, and this dream indicates the approaching Her marriage. If a single woman dreams that she is at the airport, then the place turns into her home, this indicates her inability to change her circumstances for the better. Interpretation of an airport visit for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of going to the airport and then traveling there is evidence that God Almighty will change her life for the better. If she A woman dreams that she is going to the airport for no reason, this means that the dreamer is facing some problems in her life. A married woman who is waiting for someone at the airport in a dream symbolizes her waiting for the fulfillment of a desire that may be childbirth. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is traveling to a financially rich country Her dreams indicate that her husband’s circumstances will change for the better and she will get a lot of food, but if she travels to a poor country, this means an indication that he is going through financial difficulties. Interpretation of an airport visit for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream while she is at the airport waiting for the plane means that she is waiting Impatiently for the delivery date. Whoever sees in her dream that she went to the airport and is waiting for someone, this is good news for her that a long-awaited wish will come true. One of the ominous dreams for a pregnant woman is the dream of waiting for the plane at the airport and then canceling the flight. It indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a major problem that will happen to her. Auspicious dreams for a pregnant woman see her going to the airport and one of them returning from her absence, which means the ease of giving birth and the safety and security of her new baby. Interpretation of seeing an airport for a man: Whoever sees in his dream that he went to the airport to travel abroad, the dream indicates that His life will witness new changes or he will find a new job opportunity. As for someone who sees in his dream that he went to the airport and actually traveled, this means that there are problems or debts that he is trying to get rid of. To dream of meeting people at the airport who are known to the dreamer in reality means that he will enter into a commercial project. And he meets people who can participate in it. One of the most promising dreams for a man is his dream of a friend

Dreaming of meeting people at the airport who are known to the dreamer in reality means that he will enter into a business project and meet people who can participate in it. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake in a dream and its relationship to disputes and enmity

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake. Some may begin to search for the interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake. This is because the world of dreams is very wide and some may see this vision in a dream, and it is common in some societies that it may be associated with hostility. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the dreams that can occupy the mind of many. Interpretation The dream of seeing a snake and fighting it in a dream thus provides various sites with the most important interpretations achieved in this vision. The great commentator Ibn Sirin said that when a person sees a black snake in a dream, this may indicate the occurrence of some problems between the one who saw this vision and the people surrounding him in reality. As He went to the fact that seeing this animal crawling in a dream could be an indication of the presence of some evil people who harbor hatred and malice for that person who saw this vision. Ibn Sirin also went to the fact that seeing a black snake specifically could indicate the presence of a powerful enemy. Very and very strong for the person having the vision in real life. Interpretation of seeing a snake fighting in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin concluded that whoever sees himself in a dream fighting with one of the snakes and serpents, this battle may represent a real battle that he will fight with one of his enemies in real life. Also, If one sees in a dream that he was able to overcome a snake while fighting it in a dream, then this superiority represents his superiority over the enemy in real life. Likewise, if someone sees himself being defeated in his battle with a snake or a viper in a dream, this may be a sign of the dreamer’s defeat. In a real battle with one of his evil enemies in real life. If a person sees that he has been bitten by a snake, this may indicate that something bad will happen to him from one of his enemies, and the magnitude of this abomination is as great as a snake bite can hurt him. A dream. If one sees that he has eaten snake meat, then obtaining this meat and eating it may mean obtaining money from one of his enemies in reality and accepting it as well. But if one sees that he is talking with a snake and that it is easy to talk to him, this indicates abundant goodness. Extremely will come to this person and the people around him will love him. As for some people who see a dead snake, this may indicate that this person can get rid of one of his enemies without any effort on his part. But if what the person saw was just snake eggs and not a large snake, then This vision will cause great harm to its owner. Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake by Ibn Sabreen, who - Interpretation of a dream about seeing a snake in a dream is no less dangerous than seeing it in real life, as it can also be a sign of extreme hostility and betrayal. If you see a yellow snake in a dream and chase it, it may mean This is because there are some problems between the spouses and their inability to get rid of these problems. Likewise, when a person sees a yellow snake in his dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from some physical diseases and his surrender and despair in fighting them. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream and the meaning of a dream Gecko’s interpretation of seeing a different girl

title: Interpretation of safe in a dream in all circumstances, including the correct interpretations

preview.html: To meet the interpretation of the Ministry of Finance in a dream by Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, according to his book “The Great Interpretation of Dreams,” a tank is a box that can be wooden or iron, and is specially made to hold money or valuable and valuable things in a person’s soul. Loss. The use of the box is not only limited to saving money, but there are some to store clothes or food, in addition to expensive collectibles such as jewelry, pictures, and other things that people keep for their precious value. Many may wonder the interpretation of seeing Al-Ma’mun or Al-Ma’mun in a dream, and this is what we will show you in the article. Next from the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of safety in a dream. The great dream interpreters explained that seeing a basement in a dream indicates latent nostalgia and a strong desire in the dreamer’s soul to return to the past and the happy memories it contains that give him reassurance and comfort. It is also an expression of the desire to achieve long-term dreams and ambitions in the future. Life. Whoever sees in his dream that his wardrobe is filled with many useful scientific books, this means that he will benefit from knowledge in this world and enjoy a healthy and balanced life. In some cases, this vision may express the dreamer’s feeling of deep sadness in his heart, and God knows best. The treasury is an indicator of the ambitions and aspirations of the visionary, and seeing money scattered outside the treasury shows happiness in the dreamer’s life, and God has bestowed joy and comfort on him after he went through a period of sorrows and worries. Interpretation of a dream about a money box: If someone sees that he is closing his closet tightly, this indicates his extreme concern for his money and his fear of wasting and overspending money. While seeing a man opening the safe and not finding money in it indicates the dreamer’s failure to achieve what he aspires to, and his vision could be a sign of theft. Or the loss of valuable things, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing the vault expresses the viewer’s extreme fear of himself and those around him, but if he sees it tightly closed, this indicates his safety and well-being, God willing. Whoever sees that his vault is rising, his vision is evidence that he is surrounded by many hypocrites. Who bring him nothing but malice and enmity, or there are many envious people who are jealous of his life and money. Interpretation of seeing money safe in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a cellar in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the tangled emotions and feelings that she carries in her subconscious, which are often mixed Between contentment and acceptance of her relationship with those around her and her current financial situation, or a deep feeling of sadness over many things that make her dissatisfied with her circumstances. Unmarried women often see in their dreams a wardrobe, the interpretation of which varies according to the shape and arrangement of the underwear, whether it is beautiful and elegant or scattered and inappropriate. Organized, and both cases refer to her current life circumstances and feelings. Hidden inside it. Interpretation of seeing a box of money in a dream for a married woman: Seeing the closet full of money, clean and organized, indicates that this woman enjoys a stable and peaceful marital life.
